patterns.meaning: 表示某地存在某人或某物，强调“有”
patterns.example: There is a book on the desk.

patterns.pattern: it takes sb. time to do sth.
patterns.meaning: 表示某人花费多少时间做某事
patterns.example: It takes me two hours to finish my homework.

patterns.pattern: it is adj. for sb. to do sth.
patterns.meaning: 表示对某人来说做某事是怎样的
patterns.example: It is important for us to learn English.

patterns.meaning: 表示提出建议，意为“为什么不……”
表示“如此……以至于……”，强调结果
patterns.example: He is so tired that he can’t walk.

patterns.meaning: 表示“不仅……而且……”，连接并列成分
patterns.example: She can not only sing but also dance.

patterns.meaning: 表示“太……而不能……”，强调程度过高
patterns.example: The boy is too young to go to school.

grammar.title: 形式主语it
grammar.definition: 用it作形式主语，把真正的主语（不定式或从句）放在句末
grammar.structure: It + be/take + adj./n. + to do sth.
usage: 常用于描述做某事的性质、难易程度或花费时间
examples: It is easy to learn English.
It takes her one hour to get home.

grammar.title: there be sb. doing sth.
grammar.definition: there be句型的进行时形式，表示“有某人/某物正在做某事”
usage: 强调存在状态同时强调动作正在进行
examples: There are many students playing basketball.
There is a dog running in the park.

grammar.title: 感叹句
grammar.definition: what引导的感叹句，用来感叹名词
